attributes.action: Include driving whilst smoking into the same scheme that gives  drivers a fixed penalty and points on their license.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further to a story in todays Manchester Evening News(08/03/2007) in which a motorist was fined £60 and made to have 3 points on his license for driving whilst eating a sandwich at the wheel, I feel that it is only fair that if that is seen as "driving without due care and attention" that smoking whilst driving should at least be given a similar punishment, if not harsher, as the person smoking behind the wheel also poses a fire risk should they crash or drop the cigarette.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
